meanings.sent1: After the storm, we need to restrengthen the roof to prevent leaks.
meanings.sent2: The athlete focused on restrengthening their muscles after the injury.
meanings.sent3: I guess I'll have to restrengthen my resolve to resist eating more cookies.
meanings.sent4: She decided to restrengthen her friendships by reaching out to old friends.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used fun games to restrengthen the students' understanding of math concepts.

meanings.sent1: The restrengthening of the bridge ensured its stability for years to come.
meanings.sent2: The restrengthening of the treaty was a crucial step towards peace.
meanings.sent3: The restrengthening of the superhero's powers made the villains tremble.
meanings.sent4: The restrengthening of the team's defense was evident in their recent game.
meanings.sent5: The restrengthening of the economy brought hope to the struggling citizens.
